mapper.sql: id, doll_id AS dollId, doll_name AS dollName, room_type AS roomType, topic_type AS topicType, topic_name AS topicName, groupid
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.doll_id AS dollId, a.doll_name AS dollName, a.room_type AS roomType, a.topic_type AS topicType, a.topic_name AS topicName, groupid, b.machine_code as machineCode from doll_topic a LEFT JOIN t_doll b on a.doll_id = b.id where 1=1
and b.machine_code = #{machineCode}
and a.topic_name like concat('%',#{topicName},'%')
order by id desc
select DISTINCT topic_type from doll_topic where topic_name = #{topicName}
select DISTINCT topic_type, topic_name from doll_topic
select DISTINCT topic_name from doll_topic where topic_Type = #{topicType}
